tool_description: Generates comprehensive summary reports combining analytics results into formatted documents with key insights, trends, and recommendations.

analytics_results.description: List of analytics result identifiers to include in report

target_audience.description: Target audience: executives, analysts, managers, technical

focus_areas.description: Key areas to emphasize: performance, trends, issues, opportunities

error_messages: Empty analytics data: analytics_results array cannot be empty
Invalid report format: Use one of [executive_summary, detailed_analysis, presentation]
Invalid target audience: Use one of [executives, analysts, managers, technical]
Invalid focus areas: Use combination of [performance, trends, issues, opportunities]
Insufficient data: Not enough analytics results to generate meaningful report
usage: Provide analytics result identifiers and specify report format and audience. Returns formatted report with insights and recommendations.

key_insights.description: List of most important insights from the analysis

report_sections.description: List of main sections included in the full report
